feed.title: Cypht Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cypht: v1.4.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [UDP] Sieve: Update henrique-borba/php-sieve-manager to 1.0.6 by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1134
  • [FIX]add special folders migadu by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1077

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/compare/v1.4.3...v1.4.4

entry.title: New release for Cypht: v2.2.0
entry.content:
Cypht 2.2.0 is a major release with 136 changes from 15 contributors. 140 files were affected.

This release further stabilizes branch 2.x. All the details here: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/issues/879#issuecomment-2084098307

If you need stability, stay with Cypht 1.4.x for now.

What's Changed

  • Updating version number in example docker compose by @jonocodes in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1095
  • [FIX]contacts-autocomplete_list, When I add a Cc that exists in my li… by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1060
  • Remove PHP version number from dockerhub readme by @jonocodes in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1097
  • [FIX]: Update setup_database.php to load environment before getting config object by @Yannick243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1090
  • [FIX] Make the block_list page responsive by @Bienvenumoringa in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1088
  • Fixed permanent save of special folders by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1099
  • Fixed parameter mispelling breaking the github module by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1081
  • Fixed phpunit broken test by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1100
  • added functionality : query the user's repositories and add them to the user settings on github connect by @David-Muhasa in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1086
  • [ENH]Imap quota: cypht show space used/available by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1102
  • Small improvement to code in lib folder by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1107
  • Bump certifi from 2023.7.22 to 2024.7.4 in /tests/selenium by @dependabot in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1110
  • [NEW] Error message if there is a space at the beginning or end of username or password(login, nux, smtp, imap) by @NasserNgandu in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/780
  • Unicode Support: Replace Standard PHP String Functions with Multibyte Counterparts by @kambereBr in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1051
  • [FIX][UX]Cypht Settings Tab, menus Filters PGP: Color them green whe… by @amaninyumu1 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1116
  • Bump urllib3 from 2.0.7 to 2.2.2 in /tests/selenium by @dependabot in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1094
  • fix imap sorting by @kroky in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1120
  • [UPD]Language: TRANSLATION NOT FOUND :Do you want to log out? by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1127
  • Fix selenium tests broken after bootstrap upgrade by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/998
  • [FIX] Prefetch IMAP folders after login and redirect to a page containing an ID by @Yannick243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1123
  • [FIX] Setting cookie SameSite to Lax when session type is set to DB by @Yannick243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1121
  • Fixed mailbox listed while not supporting sieve by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1118
  • [FIX]compose&reply_all: Remove Selected Email or Sender Email from Recipients List While Using 'Reply All' by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1124
  • Fixed expanding a mailbox multiple times by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1114
  • [UPD]Sievefilters(README.md) by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1131
  • [UDP] Sieve: Update henrique-borba/php-sieve-manager to 1.0.6 by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1093
  • [FIX]Sieve filters: Activating Sieve should be easier by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1109
  • Add pass to server array while connecting sieve by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1135
  • [UPD]README.md: Replace old image by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1137
  • Fixed sieve capabilites not showing by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1140
  • Fix server page ui by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1141
  • [ENH]Add a way to be able to deactivate 'delete attachment' by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1087
  • Remove development updates in production by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1138
  • Adding label/tags to cypht by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1058
  • [FIX]Profiles: Fix duplicated profile for the same email adress by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1096
  • Add copy param to RedirectFilterAction & correct imap server marges o… by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1139
  • [FIX] I fixed a PHP Warning added a condition to check if ->get('rec… by @amaninyumu1 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1128
  • Add a note about the old cypht dockerhub repository by @rodriguezny in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1145
  • [ENH] Improve Unicode Handling in DOMDocument HTML Loading by @kambereBr in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1133
  • reset form on add_filter click action by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1150
  • [FIX]Hm_Carddav class: Declare the 'api' property to avoid deprecated dynamic property creation in PHP 8.2+ by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1151
  • Add a way to display server capabilities by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1148
  • Improve release script to bundling the vendor packages with the relea… by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1142
  • Server supports custom headers by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1152
  • [FIX]Servers(Gmail): Fixing SSL certificate problem: unable to get local issuer certificate by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1156
  • Update sieve to latest version by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1163
  • [ENH] add fonctionality forward as message attachment by @amaninyumu1 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1080
  • Add zh-TW Traditional Chinese translation by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1168
  • Fix links when Cypht is embedded by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1162
  • Fix failing tests after adding traditional Chinese translation by @Yannick243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1170
  • Fix left navigation menu toggle buttons by @Yannick243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1169
  • [FIX]Some HTML messages can't be closed by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1172
  • [FIX] hm-imap.php PHP NOTICE Deprecated: Creation of dynamic propert… by @amaninyumu1 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1171
  • Fix imap tls and starttls radio button by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1157

New Contributors

  • @PeterDaveHello made their first contribution in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1168

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/compare/v2.1.0...v2.2.0

entry.title: New release for Cypht: v2.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update Cypht Docker version by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1180
  • [FIX] ensure the email address part is the only value captured when allowing the display of external resources from a particular sender by @jacob-js in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1166
  • Merge tag v2.2.0 into 2.x by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1182
  • Autocrypt messages encrept automatically by @David-Muhasa in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1183
  • Define constant for theme path by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1185
  • [EHN]Email filtering: Cypht Sieve filters: Better handling of 'Stop processing more rules' by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1098
  • [Fix] Add error message for a missing database connexion by @GedeonTS in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1188
  • [FIX]Profiles: Fixing undefined array key rmk on Profiles page by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1190
  • [EHN]Like Gmail, warn if you are about to reply to a new contact (and perh… by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1065
  • [FIX]Site Settings/General/:Warn for Unsaved Changes parameter once set cannot be unset by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1179
  • Merge master(fixes) to 2.x by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1192
  • implement-screen-email by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1132
  • Fix undeclared properties in hm-feed.php by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1085
  • Correct Broken folder_list selenium tests by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1189
  • Make bootstrap icons available on dockerized installs by @indridieinarsson in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1203
  • [UDP] Sieve: Update php-sieve-manager to latest version 1.0.8 by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1206
  • Update fixes before release by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1208
  • Update release token by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1210

New Contributors

  • @GedeonTS made their first contribution in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1188
  • @indridieinarsson made their first contribution in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1203

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/compare/v2.2.0...v2.3.0

entry.title: New release for Cypht: v2.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update release token by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1209
  • Udpdate docker version to 2.3.0 by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1211
  • Check for null in quota-root. Some servers yield null values here by @indridieinarsson in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1202
  • Fixed attachment dir when config type is set to DB by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1205
  • Update database credentials in docker-compose.dev.yaml for local development by @Yannick243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1215
  • Fix Docker theme css path by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1214
  • Remove Jason's email and instead invite people to the chat room by @David-Muhasa in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1220
  • Fixed background in tiki by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1223
  • Fix forms width for tiki integration by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1225
  • [FIX][UI] Adjust the searcbar's width by @GedeonTS in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1226
  • Merge master to 2.x by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1227
  • Comment reload_folder_list that will be reviewed after by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1228
  • [FIX] block_list page: reviewing unblock and block actions by @christer77 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1213
  • Fix default_settings configured from .env file by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1158
  • fix multibyte handling in imap literals and address splitting, improve unit tests by @kroky in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1230
  • Removed some styling not necessary after bootstrap 5 integration that break themes by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1232
  • Merge to 2.x 1 by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1231
  • Always show spinner when copying/moving to mailbox by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1235
  • Adding bulk-import accounts using csv sample file by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/976
  • Fixed broken module keyboard shortcuts by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1237
  • [FIX]Compose page: clicking on Send button can't send email by @Baraka24 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1219
  • Merge master to 2.x by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1242
  • Correct undefined const DEFAULT_NO_PASSWORD_SAVE in docker by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1244

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/compare/v2.3.0...v2.4.0

entry.title: New release for Cypht: v1.4.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [UDP] Sieve: Update php-sieve-manager to latest version 1.0.8 by @Shadow243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1207
  • [UPD] update composer.lock to fix league outdated dependencies by @Yannick243 in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1234
  • Fixed keyboard shortcuts by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1238
  • Added imap account name as part of error message by @josaphatim in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1336
  • fix(backend): ensure attachments are sent along when forwarding an email by @mercihabam in https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/pull/1407

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cypht-org/cypht/compare/v1.4.4...v1.4.5
